article.headline: Vanderbilt 77, Mississippi 62
article.story: OXFORD, Miss. (AP) -- Demarre Carroll scored 19 points to lead Vanderbilt to a 77-62 win over Mississippi on Wednesday night. Vanderbilt (16-10, 7-8 Southeastern Conference) dominated from the start, finishing 27-of-43 from the field and 9-of-16 from 3-point range. Shan Foster added 18 points for Vanderbilt and Derrick Byars put 16 on the board. Dwayne Curtis led Ole Miss (14-14, 4-11) with 15 points and Jermey Parnell added 14. The win enhanced Vanderbilt's postseason hopes. The Commodores have won four of the last six games and have a six-game winning streak against Ole Miss. Vanderbilt built a 13-2 lead in the opening 3 minutes, connecting on its first five shots from the field. Byars hit three consecutive 3-pointers. The Commodores led 41-33 at halftime after leading by as many as 17 points. Byars had 13 points at halftime for Vanderbilt, and hit 75 percent from the field. Vanderbilt was never seriously threatened in the second half. The Commodores built their biggest lead, 70-45, on a 3-point shot by Foster with 6:45 left. Ole Miss hit only 40 percent from the field. Curtis shot 7-of-10. Vanderbilt had 20 turnovers, but outrebounded the Rebels 28-26, including eight apiece from Julian Terrell and Carroll.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
